name: Vekquence
summary:
ABOUT
Vekquence is a simple puzzle game about finding the correct path when there isn’t one. Failing or trying something more radical might open up a new oportunity to discover a new path, a new angle at the challenge solution.

GAMEPLAY
You switch between 2 teleporters, the active one can move, the inactive one can’t but can portal out the Vek (A especial circle that can collect Quencies to open the next area).

Types of challenges are varied and new mechanics and complexity are introduced as the player progresses.
More info, screens, videos and overall progress will be posted when possible.
